Description: Come see this house! We can be flexible for summer rent (reduced rent amount). At this price, you can rent this house as a 4 bedroom, a 5 bedroom or a 6 bedroom. Rent remains the same! This is a very popular 6 bedroom house. There are 4 bedrooms on the main floor and 2 bedrooms downstairs with an additional living room. Two of the bedrooms have their own external doors for added flexibility. Lawn and yard maintained by owner. House proudly owned by a UPS alumni.
